long_description: The updated edition of the. Author: Warren Ohlrich. Softcover; 184 pages; color photographs and maps. People's Press; copyright 2011. . Includes maps, a trip checklist, hut procedures, trailhead information and a primer on winter navigation and safety. Also features a brief history of the hut system.
short_description: The updated edition of the 10th Mountain Hut Guide is indispensible for those wishing to explore the famed system of backcountry huts around Aspen, Vail, Leadville and Breckenridge, Colorado.
